scenario.name: uas_script
scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 183 Session Progress [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number][local_port] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Require: 100rel Rseq: [cseq] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=relible_answer 10000 10000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=relible_answer c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

SIP/2.0 180 Ringing [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number][local_port] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [$inv_cseq] INVITE Require: 100rel Rseq: [cseq] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=relible_answer 10000 10001 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=relible_answer c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

SIP/2.0 200 OK Via:[$inv_via] From:[$inv_from] To:[$inv_to];tag=[call_number][local_port] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [$inv_cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$number][local_ip]:[local_port];user=phone> Content-Length: 0
